page.description: Loads a class definition from an .a5xbclass file.
page.prototype: dim result as L = loadClass(C className)

argument.name: className
argument.description: The name of the xbasic class to load from an .a5xbclass file. The class name can optionally include the .a5xbclass file extension.

return.name: result
return.description: .t. or .f. depending on whether or not the class was successfully loaded.

page.example: dim flag as l flag = loadClass("helloclass") dim h as helloclass

see.ref: Creating and Loading External Xbasic Class Files
